attributes.action: STOP TESCO TAKING OVER MAJOR FOOD AND CATERING SUPPLIERS  BOOKERS
attributes.background: THIS TAKEOVER WILL GIVE TESCO CONTROL OVER SUPPLIES TO SMALLER RETAIL OUTLETS AND AN ABILITY TO REDUCE PROFIT MARG.INS

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of the Competition and Markets Authority (CMA). It's been announced that the CMA will be looking into this.

You can find out more here:
https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/competition-and-markets-authority
